title: Wild Weed / She Should Have Said No (1949) Colorized Full Movie with Subtitles

sources.title: Wild Weed / She Should Have Said No (1949) Colorized Full Movie with Subtitles
sources.description:
A good girl, gone very bad! Shocking and Disturbing Tale of Debauchery!
A chorus girl's career is ruined and her brother is driven to suicide when she starts smoking marijuana.

Also Known As: She Should Have Said No

Watch the original Black & White version: https://youtu.be/YY2mmoPWjPk

Director: Sam Newfield
Writers: Richard H. Landau, Arthur Hoerl
Stars: Lila Leeds, Alan Baxter, Lyle Talbot
Genre: Propaganda, Drama, Stoner comedy
